Interface MatrixStorage<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the element type * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
All Known Subinterfaces:
RealDoubleMatrixStorage
All Known Implementing Classes:
BandedMatrixStorage, DenseMatrixStorage, DiagonalMatrixStorage, DirectRealDoubleMatrixStorage, HeapRealDoubleMatrixStorage, SparseMatrixStorage, SymmetricMatrixStorage, TriangularMatrixStorage, TridiagonalMatrixStorage
public interface MatrixStorage<E>
Internal storage abstraction for matrices.

Different implementations provide optimal storage for different matrix types (dense, sparse, symmetric, etc.).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • get

      E get(int row, int col)
      Returns the element at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index
      col - the column index
      Returns:
      the element at [row, col]

    • set

      void set(int row, int col, E value)
      Sets the element at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index
      col - the column index
      value - the value to set

      Returns the number of rows.
      Returns:

      Returns the number of columns.
      Returns:

    • clone

      MatrixStorage<E> clone()
